snippet: Kellogg said it would buy palm oil only from companies that do not destroy tropical rain forests to produce the additive, which is used in many processed foods.
abstract: Kellogg announces it will buy palm oil only from companies that do not destroy tropical rain forests to produce the additive, which is used in many processed foods.
lead_paragraph: Kellogg said it would buy palm oil only from companies that do not destroy tropical rain forests to produce the additive, which is used in many processed foods.

headline.main: Rain Forest Concerns Change Palm Oil Purchasing by Kellogg
headline.print_headline: Rain Forest Concerns Change Palm Oil Purchasing by Kellogg
